journeys Journeys cluster images by time and location # Journeys: Automatic Photo Album Creation for Nextcloud Automatically cluster your images into journeys (vacations/trips) and create albums for each journey. **Requires the Memories app.** ## ✨ Features - **🗺️ Location & Time Clustering:** Group images by when and where they were taken - **🗂️ Album Creation:** Albums are created automatically for each journey - **⚙️ Customizable:** Control minimum cluster size, time gap, and distance thresholds ## 🚀 OCC Command Usage php occ journeys:cluster-create-albums [maxTimeGap] [maxDistanceKm] [minClusterSize] **Arguments:** - `user` — The user to cluster images for (**required**) - `maxTimeGap` — Max allowed time gap in hours (optional, default: 24) - `maxDistanceKm` — Optional Maximum allowed distance in kilometers between consecutive images in a cluster (default: 50.0) - `minClusterSize` — Minimum images per cluster (optional, default: 3) **How time gap influences clustering:** The `maxTimeGap` defines the largest allowed time (in hours) between two consecutive images for them to be grouped into the same journey. If the gap between two images exceeds this value, a new journey (album) is started. Smaller values create more, shorter journeys; larger values group more images together. **Example:** php occ journeys:cluster-create-albums admin 24 100 5

0.4.0 (2025-09-03)

  • Home-aware clustering: Segment timeline into near-home and away-from-home blocks; cluster each block independently.
  • Near-home alignment: when left at built-in defaults, near-home time gap aligns to global, and distance aligns to global but is capped at 25km for finer local clustering.
  • Away thresholds default to 36h / 50km and can be tuned via CLI to better handle multi-day gaps during long trips.

0.3.2 (2025-07-27)

  • Default maxDistanceKm for clustering is now 50.0 (was 100.0)

0.3.1 (2025-07-20)

  • SystemTag-only album identification: New albums are created without postfix, identified and managed solely via SystemTags.
  • Legacy albums with postfix are still purged via fallback logic.
  • Removal of postfix from new album names.

0.3.0-alpha (2025-07-20)

  • Spatial constraint for interpolation: Only interpolate image locations if the two neighboring images are within 1km of each other.
  • Stricter time gap for single neighbor: When only one reference image is available, the time gap must not be larger than 1 hour.
  • Improved clustering accuracy: Prevented assignment of interpolated locations over large distances.
